text: Smile is British pop singer Lily Allen's first major single. The song is also the first single from the artist's 2006 album, Alright, Still. It has been on Top 10 lists worldwide and has been translated into Simlish as a song in the game Sims 2. The song is also in Thrillville. ==References== Category:2006 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Lily Allen songs
title: Smile (Lily Allen song)
